Uses of Class
com.vmware.nsx.model.ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder

  • Packages that use ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.nsx.model  

    • Uses of ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder in com.vmware.nsx.model

      Methods in com.vmware.nsx.model that return ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setCertificateChainDepth​(java.lang.Long certificateChainDepth)
      authentication depth is used to set the verification depth in the client certificates chain.
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setClientAuth​(java.lang.String clientAuth)
      Possible values are: ClientSslProfileBinding.CLIENT_AUTH_REQUIRED ClientSslProfileBinding.CLIENT_AUTH_IGNORE client authentication mode
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setClientAuthCaIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientAuthCaIds)
      If client auth type is REQUIRED, client certificate must be signed by one of the trusted Certificate Authorities (CAs), also referred to as root CAs, whose self signed certificates are specified.
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setClientAuthCrlIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientAuthCrlIds)
      A Certificate Revocation List (CRL) can be specified in the client-side SSL profile binding to disallow compromised client certificates.
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setDefaultCertificateId​(java.lang.String defaultCertificateId)
      A default certificate should be specified which will be used if the server does not host multiple hostnames on the same IP address or if the client does not support SNI extension.
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setSniCertificateIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sniCertificateIds)
      Client-side SSL profile binding allows multiple certificates, for different hostnames, to be bound to the same virtual server.
      ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder ClientSslProfileBinding.Builder.setSslProfileId​(java.lang.String sslProfileId)
      Client SSL profile defines reusable, application-independent client side SSL properties.
